Ni yao ba guo quan shangci gei shei, jiu shangci shei; ni yao ba guo quan cong shei shouzhong duo qu, jiu cong shei shouzhong duo qu; ni yao shi shei zungui, jiu shi shei zungui; ni yao shi shei beijian, jiu shi shei beijian; fuli zhi zhangwo zai ni de shou li; ni duiyu wanshi, que shi quanneng de
